update.name: MOD_COUNTGHSVS
update.description: Joomla frontend module. Counts numbers up from a start value to an end value. Starts counting when scrolling into the page area where the module is positioned. Uses JQuery JavaScript. For me, useless, resource-guzzling website rubbish, but some customers want something like this.
update.maintainer: G@HService Berlin Neukölln, Volkmar Volli Schlothauer
